package.name: local_gps
package.description: A middleman that subscribes to the gazebo world ground truth position of the proj1robot, calculates it's distance from the top 4 corners of the room, and scales the gaussian noise by distance, with the provided distribution being the noise at 1 meter. It publishes to /robot/gps in a 2x2 multidim float64. Each one representing the (0,0), (0,10), (10,10), and (10,0) coordinates based on matrix positions respectively ([0,0], [0,1], [1,1], [1,0]), as beacons.
